mapper.insert: insert into OPERATORS(USERNAME, PASSWORD, ROLE_ID) values(#{username}, #{password}, #{role.id})
mapper.select: select count(*) > 0 from OPERATORS where USERNAME = #{username}

select o.ID OPERATOR_ID, o.USERNAME OPERATOR_USERNAME, o.PASSWORD OPERATOR_PASSWORD, o.DISABLED OPERATOR_DISABLED, r.ID ROLE_ID, r.NAME ROLE_NAME, r.DESCRIPTION ROLE_DESCRIPTION, p.ID PERMISSION_ID, p.NAME PERMISSION_NAME, p.DESCRIPTION PERMISSION_DESCRIPTION from OPERATORS o inner join ROLES r on o.ROLE_ID = r.ID left join ROLE_PERMISSIONS rp on rp.ROLE_ID = r.ID left join PERMISSIONS p on rp.PERMISSION_ID = p.ID where o.USERNAME = #{username}
